meanings.sent1: The superconductive material allowed electricity to flow without resistance.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the superconductive properties of the new alloy.
meanings.sent3: The superconductive wire was so efficient that it made the old wires jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a superconductive magnet, attracting innovative ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superconductive effect was like magic, making the experiment seem like a wizard's trick.

meanings.sent1: The superconductive substance displayed remarkable properties at low temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The superconductive material lost all resistance when cooled below a critical temperature.
meanings.sent3: The superconductive fridge kept the ice cream so cold, it was practically frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as superconductive as the wire, lighting up the room with positivity.
meanings.sent5: The superconductive behavior of the liquid nitrogen was a sight to behold, defying all expectations.

meanings.sent1: The superconductive device could revolutionize the field of electronics.
meanings.sent2: The engineers designed a superconductive circuit for maximum efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The superconductive robot moved with such precision, it seemed almost sentient.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were superconductive, sparking creativity in everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The superconductive material was like a superhero, saving energy and costs with its amazing abilities.
